name: Miles Away
description:
Guys helped in this game:
FunnyGuy77 - Helped me with Auto Map Generation - Check out his twitch account and be sure to follow him https://www.twitch.tv/funnyguy77

Features v1.2:
*New Lava Tile.
*Added loading screen.
*Added game presentation at start.

Planned Features:
*Changeable trail effects!
*More Tiles.
*Better Main Menu!
*Better Models!
*Flips/Tricks!
*Sounds!

Changed the name to Miles Away because copyright :P

Controls:
A - Left
D - Right
